
```{r}
plot_energy = 
  ggplot(data_energy[gen %% 10 == 0])+
  geom_line(
    aes(
      gen, mean_energy, group = repl,
      col = as.factor(repl)
    ),
    alpha = 0.5,
    show.legend = F
  )+
  scale_colour_discrete_sequential(
    palette = "Greens"
  )+
  scale_y_continuous(
    trans = ggallin::pseudolog10_trans
  )+
  theme_test()+
  coord_cartesian(
    ylim = c(0, NA)
  )
```
